Package net.silthus.schat.repository

Class InMemoryRepository<K,E extends Entity<K>>

java.lang.Object
net.silthus.schat.repository.InMemoryRepository<K,E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<K,E>
public abstract class InMemoryRepository<K,E extends Entity<K>> extends Object implements Repository<K,E>
A simple in memory implementation of a Repository.

The entity store uses a ConcurrentHashMap by default. This can be changed using the InMemoryRepository(Map) constructor.

Since:
1.0.0
